responses.title: I've a mind like a steel trap, and the physique to go with it!
I'm more than a bit tightly wound.
First Blood! Ha ha ha ha ha!
I am a can of whoop-ass!
Tinker, you're a credit to our race!
Hey, us little guys gotta stick together, allright, Sniper?
Hey, I got one of those too, Pudge!
Tinker, you were like a brother to me!
Tinker, where'd you get those wonderful toys?
Sniper, you? There's one in every family.
I shift to a higher gear!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha hee hey ha ha ha!
What time is it? It's killing time.
Not the strongest enemy I've grappled with.
I tested your mettle. And found it wanting.
I'll polish my armor in your blood.
I keep my enemies close, and their corpses closer.
If you come back, I'll kill you again.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
He he he he he he.
Ha. Ha. Ha. That was canned laughter.
That, my friends, is why metal will never die!

name: Killing a Hero With a Flare at Long Range

responses.title: If only money were a shield, eh?
I'm lost…like gears in the rain.
I have a degree in mechanical domineering!
I may be canned but I'm no ham.
I'm the six million gold piece man!
I am the new Mark Two Rattletrap. Ah, just kidding.
Bleep bloop, I am a robot. Eh, just kidding.
I've had my eye on that!
Scepter! Just what my hook needed!
Scepter! The perfect accessory for my hookshot!

You can't fight what you can't see!

responses.title: Hard on the outside, but with a soft delicious center.
